reviewText: Not your average yoga session!  I love that it's different than the usual sun salutations. Some of the poses are challenging, but I am pushing my limits and loving making progress.  Great dvd.
Great Yoga DVD will recommend to family and friends.
I like these yoga tapes and Tara Stiles is a great teacher. However these dvds are quite repetitive and could easily purchase 2 singles instead of the complete set and get all the routines.
I turn on and workout this this DVD almost every morning before I go to work . And night before I go to bed , right in my own bedroom . Following Tera AM and PM workout instruction
